title: NEL service disruption due to signalling fault

updates.text: Update: NEL svc is delayed due to a signalling fault. Additional travel time of 15 minutes may be expected. Free regular bus svc available btw Punggol and HarbourFront. We are sorry.
NEL svc is delayed due to a signalling fault. Additional travel time of about 10 minutes may be expected. Free regular bus services available between Punggol and HarbourFront. We are sorry.
